StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: An enthusiastic & high energy driven professional with over 1 years of experience targeting challenging opportunities in Research and Analytics Possess intellectual curiosity and skills to mine hidden value from sets of structured, semi-structured and unstructured data Hands-on experience in Linear Regression Analysis, Cluster Analysis and Factor Analysis to conduct research in various sectors; familiar with Base SAS including PROC SQL Resourceful in conducting research activities involving understanding and sourcing information and processing of data and applying the same using technical knowledge ensuring timeliness and quality Possess good understanding in collating and interpreting data for determining outcomes for various companies / organizations Keen analyst with excellence in gathering and understanding requirements of clients & other multiple stakeholders followed by translation into functional specifications as well as provisioning of suitable solutions

PositionHistory.Title: Risk Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Key Result Areas Worked on multiple lines of business (LOB) to analyze the data and estimate the losses, across Terrorism and Energy domain; prepared documents and reports of the losses for further decision making and delivered the final reports to the client Functioned for Global Property; worked with property data of US to analyze and estimate the Losses Used R programming and MS Excel for data reviewing and data manipulation; utilized RISKLINK and Applied Insurance Research (AIR) tools for loss estimation Interacted with Underwriters regarding the exposure information like insured values, financial limits & retention of different lines of business on a regular basis Identified, collected, processed and analyzed the data, specimens, and/or samples according to established protocol, procedures & standards Planned and organized day-to-day research activities and resolved procedural problems as appropriate to the timely completion of research objectives Implemented & standardized KPI metrics through comprehensive reviewing & redesigning and relating directly to product features, resulted in better insights, consistent metrics, and reduced service cost Analyzed and processed complex data sets using advanced querying, and analytics tools Translated business requirements into system requirements through analysis of the existing production system including different system interfaces with other applications Estimated the losses that could be sustained due to a catastrophic event such as Hurricane, Earthquake, Flood and Windstorm Engaged in data capture and reporting on a daily basis

Shruti Malhotra
Risk Analyst seeking roles in Research analysis, Data Mining, Linear Regression, CAT Modelling, Research Analysis, Requirement Gathering, Secondary Research, Quality Management, Cost Control, Process Improvement
Current Designation: Risk Analyst Total Experience: 1 Year(s) 1 Month(s) Current Company: xceedance consulting pvt ltd Notice Period: 15 Days or less Current Location: Delhi Highest Degree: M.A [Economics] Pref. Location: Delhi / NCR, Gurgaon, Noida Functional Area: Analytics & Business Intelligence Role: Business Analyst Industry: KPO / Research /Analytics Marital Status: Single/unmarried Key Skills: Risk Analyst, Data Analyst, Data Analysis, Data Mining, Linear Regression, CAT Modelling, Research Analysis, Requirement Gathering, Secondary Research, Qualitative Research, Quantitative Research, Market Research
